casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Hampton, Appellant.
Submitted November 8, 1972;
reargued April 25, 1974.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Mandarino, JJ.
John It. Merrick, Assistant Public Defender, for appellant.
Timothy H. Knauer, Assistant District Attorney, with him F. Ned Hand and James B. Freeman, Assistant District Attorneys, and William H. Lamb, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
October 16, 1974:
